n: Another comedy sketch from [This American Life](http://www.thisamericanlife.org) that I'm sure you will enjoy. Remember [Americans in Paris](http://www.thisamericanlife.org/radio-archives/episode/165/americans-in-paris)?
These assholes can't go out of business fast enough. Here's the fixed version from [EARNEST_CYBORG9](http://twitter.com/EARNEST_CYBORG9/status/332589668577202176/photo/1).
